alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 3:08PM AKST until December 26 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions with reductions in visibility to one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches, are expected. * WHERE...Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley. * WHEN...3 AM Saturday to 6 PM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
